short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display co2 emitted for the production and delivery of every product on amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays your actual impact on the environment. Instead of guessing at how sustainable and eco friendly your habits are, now you KNOW and make changes.

Note/Cool Stuff:
Improvements to carbon footprint calculations will be made. Also, we are trying to partner with amazon to add this as a feature to their website.
